item.title: Are you a creative professional who uses Envato? Get $40 for taking a 25-minute survey! - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a LOT of freelancers who use Envato and work on creative and design projects to take our 25-minute survey. Specifically, we're interested in creative professionals with the following titles:

- Graphic Designer
- Web Designer or Developer
- UX or UI Designer
- Game Designer or Developer
- Creative Director or Art Director
- Brand Manager or Strategist
- Creative or Commercial Producer
- Content Creator
- Photographer
- Videographer / Video Editor
- Motion Graphics Designer or VFX Artist
- Visual Artist or Illustrator
- 3D Modeler / Artist
- Music Producer, Audio Editor, Sound Designer

Please only respond if you have experience related to the above titles and use Envato. We may follow up with you with a couple of questions to ensure you're qualified for our survey.

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 16, 2024 14:53 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Website Asset, Web Design, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Audio Editing, Content Creation, Art Direction
Skills: Website Asset, Web Design, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Audio Editing, Content Creation, Art Direction
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA

item.title: LOOM Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
## Job Description: Video Editor for Cold Pitches

### Overview
We are seeking a proficient video editor to edit our cold video pitches. The ideal candidate will work within the Loom software, handling straightforward editing tasks such as trimming and stitching to remove mistakes in speech, like ums and ahs. This role requires no additional visuals or fancy effects.

### Responsibilities
- Edit 10-50 short videos daily, each around 5-7 minutes long.
- Trim and stitch video content to remove speech errors.
- Ensure the final videos are polished and professional.

### Requirements
- Proficiency in English with the ability to understand advanced language concepts.
- Comfortable working with Loom software.
- Attention to detail and strong editing skills.

### Benefits
- Consistent daily work.
- Potential for bonuses and long-term contracts.

### Application
Please do not apply if you are not comfortable editing English audio. If you meet the above requirements and are interested in this opportunity, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 14:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Dialogue Editing, Audio Editing, Video Cleanup, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Loom, Editing & Proofreading, Video Post-Editing, Film Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Videography
Skills: Dialogue Editing, Audio Editing, Video Cleanup, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Loom, Editing & Proofreading, Video Post-Editing, Film Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Job details:
Niche: Health & Nutrition
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 13-18 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video

Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the Health & Nutrition niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): Health & Nutrition STORIES/FACTS

The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the quality of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/fx0kIEOL59Q?si=bO8SEpiHV6-F4-0V

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with “strawberrylemonade”, so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 16, 2024 14:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Country: United States
click to apply
